comments.body:
This sounds like a duplicate of ALOY-811, which should be a TIMOB issue as well. [~csullivan], can you please look at ALOY-811 and confirm that it is in fact a liveview issue (not one to be resolved from alloy's side) and move it to TIMOB if that is the case? I'm guessing you'll either resolve this ticket or ALOY-811 as a duplicate in the process.

[~mxia] there should be no generated Resources until the app is compiled by alloy.
Marking this a duplicate of TIMOB-15009.
